title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 87.3 - Additional documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 87.3 - Additional documents

State Regulations

The following additional documents shall be submitted to the
superintendent as they become available to the applicant: (a) copies of all notices, consents and
authorizations required by Federal Law and regulations in connection with the
conversion; and
(b) opinion of
counsel for the applicant as to compliance with all requirements of Federal and

State law in connection with the conversion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
87.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
